document.full_text: toyota motor  said on thursday that it sold 38,500 cars in china during may, 35 percent less than a year ago, due the part shortage caused by japan's devastating earthquake and tsunami in march.
document.title: toyota says china sales down 35 percent in may from year ago
lines_and_colors: toyota motor  said on thursday that it sold 38,500 cars in china during may, 35 percent less than a year ago, due the part shortage caused by japan's devastating earthquake and tsunami in march.
